overview: Tayloe Stansbury leads VMwareâ€™s worldwide information systems infrastructure, with a focus on showcasing VMwareâ€™s technologies. Tayloe has more than 24 years of experience in the software industry, most recently as executive vice president of Ariba, where he led engineering, product management, hosting, IT, and customer support. Previously, Tayloe held executive engineering and general management roles at Calico Commerce and Xerox. Before that, he worked on developer tools at Borland and Sun, and did research in computational linguistics at Xerox PARC. Tayloe graduated with honors in math and computer science from Harvard University.
